import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.e735f532:
plt.figure(figsize = (18, 7))
x = df["Date"]
dy = df["Derivative"]
y = df["Values"]

plt.errorbar(x, y, yerr=dy, fmt='o',ecolor = "red", color='blue', capsize = 10)
plt.title("Error Bars by Producer Price Index for All Dates", size = 15)
plt.yticks(size = 15)
plt.xticks(size = 20)
plt.show()

source.8baa9e5e: # 4. Error Line Graph of Task 2 and 3
source.a9e091d3:
# Task
1. Error bar of the whole data
2. Error bar for the period 1/12/2019 - 1/4/2021
3. Error bar for the period 1/01/2002 - 1/01/2012
4. A error line graph with the task 2 and 3 together
